mapper.insert: insert into bhif_pay_ibank_para_info (DATA_DT, BANK_NUM, PAY_IBANK_NUM, IBANK_CATE_CD, LINE_TYP_CD, BELG_DRCT_PRTC_LINE_IBANK_NUM, BELG_LPR_IBANK_NUM, CITIC_UP_PRTC_ORG_IBANK_STR, UNTK_LINE_IBANK_NUM, BELG_PBC_IBANK_NUM, BELG_NODE_CD, BELG_URBN_CD, PAY_IBANK_FULL_NM, PAY_IBANK_SHT_NM, JOIN_BIZ_SYS_ID_CD, JOIN_LARG_AMT_SYS_STAT_CD, JOIN_SML_AMT_SYS_STAT_CD, JOIN_WBANK_SYS_STAT_CD, ADDR, ZIP_CD, CONT_TEL, EML_ADDR, SPRT_ONE_TWO_AGENT_TYP_CD, VALID_IND, SETUP_TMSTP, UPD_TMSTP, EFFT_DT, INVLDTN_DT) values (#{dataDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payIbankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ibankCateCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belgDrctPrtcLineIbankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belgLprIbankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citicUpPrtcOrgIbankStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{untkLineIbankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belgPbcIbankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belgNodeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belgUrbnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payIbankFullNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payIbankShtNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinBizSysIdCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinLargAmtSysStatCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinSmlAmtSysStatCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinWbankSysStatCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emlAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sprtOneTwoAgentTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{setupTmstp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updTmstp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{efftDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{invldtnDt,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select DATA_DT, BANK_NUM, PAY_IBANK_NUM, IBANK_CATE_CD, LINE_TYP_CD, BELG_DRCT_PRTC_LINE_IBANK_NUM, BELG_LPR_IBANK_NUM, CITIC_UP_PRTC_ORG_IBANK_STR, UNTK_LINE_IBANK_NUM, BELG_PBC_IBANK_NUM, BELG_NODE_CD, BELG_URBN_CD, PAY_IBANK_FULL_NM, PAY_IBANK_SHT_NM, JOIN_BIZ_SYS_ID_CD, JOIN_LARG_AMT_SYS_STAT_CD, JOIN_SML_AMT_SYS_STAT_CD, JOIN_WBANK_SYS_STAT_CD, ADDR, ZIP_CD, CONT_TEL, EML_ADDR, SPRT_ONE_TWO_AGENT_TYP_CD, VALID_IND, SETUP_TMSTP, UPD_TMSTP, EFFT_DT, INVLDTN_DT from bhif_pay_ibank_para_info order by PAY_IBANK_NUM asc
